title: Modern and Trendy - logotypemaker Font #59
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725194706im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_3528.jpg)

The font came from logotypemaker.com and is font number 59... However I cannot find a similar font to match it. Any help will be very much appreciated! Much love!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725194706/http:/typophile.com/files/font_376.jpg) | 7.55 KB |
author: nemesisdan

comments.content: It looks like **[NP Naipol All in One (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725194706/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=NP%20Naipol%20All%20in%20One%20-%20Bold&fid=e54a207bbffcdbf37c6260dc26d0ce27&fsize=60&text=Romero%20Gallo%20Abogados&wrap=2)** free font by Pol Udomwittayanukul [2005]
